parameters.name: CrawlerNameList
parameters.description: A list of the names of crawlers about which to retrieve metrics. (string) ---

nested_items.name: CrawlerMetricsList
nested_items.description: A list of metrics for the specified crawler.

nested_items.name: TimeLeftSeconds
nested_items.description: The estimated time left to complete a running crawl.

nested_items.name: StillEstimating
nested_items.description: True if the crawler is still estimating how long it will take to complete this run.

nested_items.name: LastRuntimeSeconds
nested_items.description: The duration of the crawler's most recent run, in seconds.

nested_items.name: MedianRuntimeSeconds
nested_items.description: The median duration of this crawler's runs, in seconds.

nested_items.name: TablesCreated
nested_items.description: The number of tables created by this crawler.

nested_items.name: TablesUpdated
nested_items.description: The number of tables updated by this crawler.

nested_items.name: TablesDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of tables deleted by this crawler.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token, if the returned list does not contain the last metric available.
